## Prerequisites
- [pixi](https://pixi.sh/latest/)
- [WSL](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/wsl/install) (required for Windows users to utilize Quarto) 

## Environment Setup

### Local Environment

1. Clone repository

```bash
git clone https://github.com/jakepenzak/caml
```

2. Change directory (cd) into project root then create your pixi environments:

```bash
pixi install
pixi install --environment dev
pixi install --environment dev-ray
pixi install --environment dev-pyspark
```

3. Activate you pixi shell for dev environment

```bash
pixi shell --environment dev
```

4. Initialize pre-commit hooks via `pre-commit install`

5. Edit & test code locally (as applicable)

Please refer to the [pixi](https://pixi.sh/latest/) documentation for modifying dependencies and any other pixi related questions.
